custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT AssetTrendingEntry.assetTrendingEntryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM AssetTrendingEntry WHERE [$ASSET_TRENDING_ENTRY_IN_CLASS_NAME_IDS$] ( AssetTrendingEntry.createDate >= ? OR ? IS NULL )
SELECT DISTINCT AssetTrendingEntry.* FROM AssetTrendingEntry WHERE [$ASSET_TRENDING_ENTRY_IN_CLASS_NAME_IDS$] ( AssetTrendingEntry.createDate >= ? OR ? IS NULL )
